TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PropertyDefinition extends System.Windows.Markup.MemberDefinition

summary.span: 支持在声明性 XAML 中定义类属性的标记技术。

span.span: Supports a markup technique of defining properties of a class in declarative XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在声明性 XAML 中定义类成员的全部功能在此 API 中不是自包含的。Support for the overall feature of defining members of a class in declarative XAML is not self-contained in this API. 此 API 仅提供使声明在 XAML 中可行的标记定义。This API only provides the markup definitions that make the declarations possible in XAML. 如何解释此类 XAML 的实际生成任务处理特定于单个生成任务以及引用它们的框架或技术。The actual build task handling of how such XAML is interpreted is specific to individual build tasks and the frameworks or technologies that reference them.

summary.span: 获取或设置定义的属性的访问级别。

span.span: Gets or sets the access level of the defined property.

value.span: 定义的属性的访问级别，以字符串的形式表示。

span.span: The access level of the defined property, as a string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此处提供的字符串在生成操作的上下文中进行了解释。The string provided here is interpreted in the context of the build action. 生成操作可能依赖于语言，并且可能会使用该语言的访问级别关键字约定。Build actions are potentially language-dependent and might use the access level keyword conventions of that language.
